regen.absent_element: action when automatic transfer to Shunting fails or is not confirmed by the driver
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the driver and prevent Shunting operation if automatic transfer to Shunting fails or is not confirmed by the driver within a specified time frame.

label: Before authomatic transition to Shunting, ETCS shall request confirmation from the driver.
absence: confirmation from the driver if authomatic transition to Shunting
